meanings.definition: The quality or state of being in accordance with established standards or norms.
meanings.sent1: Her normativenesses in following the school rules made her a role model for other students.
meanings.sent2: The company's normativenesses in ethical business practices earned them a good reputation.
meanings.sent3: Even the mischievous puppy showed normativenesses by sitting quietly during the class.
meanings.sent4: The garden's normativenesses in blooming flowers at the right time amazed the visitors.
meanings.sent5: The chef's normativenesses in creating delicious dishes delighted the customers.

meanings.definition: The act of conforming to societal expectations or rules.
meanings.sent1: His normativenesses in dressing appropriately for the occasion impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: She showed normativenesses by always arriving on time for meetings.
meanings.sent3: The cat's normativenesses in using the scratching post instead of the sofa was a relief.
meanings.sent4: The team's normativenesses in working together seamlessly led to their success.
meanings.sent5: The student's normativenesses in completing homework assignments diligently was commendable.
